Reviews.Title: Bought 1 then 3 more
Reviews.Author: Bill Billingsly
Reviews.Content: These are great little HD cameras for the price.  Very tiny and conceal well.  The picture is good.  Keep in mind, HD will require lots of horsepower on the computer so you'll probably have to end up bumping down your res unless you've got a super machine.  I have a very nice i7 with 24 Gbs of RAM with multiple cams and the addition of these really put a lot of overhead on it.

ProductInfo.Features:
1-Megapixel CMOS Sensor
30 fps @ 1280x800
Real-time H.264, MPEG-4 and MJPEG Compression (Triple Codec)
Built-in IEEE 802.3af Compliant PoE
Built-in MicroSD/SDHC Card Slot for On-board Storage
Compact and Stylish Design
Easy Installation
f = 6 mm (FD8136-F6)
ProductInfo.Name: Vivotek FD8136 Surveillance/Network Camera - Color, Monochrome (FD8136-6) -
